_header: I pray daily their pains to assuage
_description: Concluding three lines of a love song

BLAdd5465.Transcription: …I pray daily ther paynys to asswage…
BLAdd5465.Note:
With music in three voices, but only the ends of two of the voices
                    survive.
BLAdd5465.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Die Lieder des Fairfax MS (Add. 5465 Brit. Mus.).” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         106 (1901): 48-70: 55.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 358.
